Costa Rica

Here, visitors enjoy lovely tropical beaches, grand adventures, the wonders of nature and scintillating culture - all the necessary components of an ideal vacation or holiday. No wonder thousands have made Costa Rica their top travel choice!

Things to Do

Mettings and Incentives

We are the ideal destination to hold your next meeting or incentive trip.

Adventure

Costa Rica is a land of volcanoes, rainforests and cloud forests, huge waterfalls and mighty rivers.

Ecotourism

Costa Rica is considered one of the most bio-diverse regions in the world.

Sun and Beaches

Costa Rica is considered one of the most bio-diverse regions in the world.

Culture

The richness of Costa Rica stems from the cultural diversity of its people.

Families

Costa Rica has a great place to experience nature’s wonders with your children; the country is a must for families!

Rural Tourism

Costa Rica has invested more than 50 years in rural development.

Birdwatching

Costa Rica has long been famous among serious bird watchers, and many people who never before had an interest change their mind when they encounter the country's spectacular avian diversity.

Honeymoon and Weddings

Costa Rica is waiting for you to live this experience.

Wellness

If stress is a part of your daily life, Costa Rica is the cure.

Greatest Wildlife Spectacles

Fill your calendar with the most wonderful natural and wildlife events.

Cruises

Costa Rica in English, means rich coast. Every cruise ship visiting Costa Rica understands why.
